servlet.description: Perform Login
Creates a new course. Requires admin privileges checked for by AdminFilter
Creates a new project for a given course. Requires InstructorAction privileges checked for by InstructorActionFilter
Submits a project using the web interface
Uploads a submission into the submission table. This servlet does the heavy lifting for SubmitProjectViaWeb and SubmitProjectViaEclipse
Requests a release test for a particular submission
Negotiates a one-time password between an eclipse client and the submitServer
Handles the submission of a project through the Course Project Manager in Eclipse
Handles a buildserver request for a submission to be tested
Returns a project jarfile to a buildServer
Reports test outcomes from the buildserver
Uploads a new project jarfile for a given project
Downloads a submission for the given submissionPK
Logout from the current session
Registers students for a given course
Downloads a project jarfile from the database
Assigns points to each test value
MakeProjectVisible
Logs a message from the buildserver
Changes the status of a testSetup (projectJarfile)
Grants an extension of N hours for a student for a particular project
Downloads a zip archive of the best submissions per student
Re-computes the point values for a project by calculating the overall scores for the testRuns and submissions according to the testOutcomeCollection
Prints the grades in CSV format
Prints the grades in CSV format
Uploads a snapshot submission from CVS
Print table giving test result history
Prints the grades in CSV format for the grades database
Prints a diff file from a snapshot
Downloads the most recent on-time and late submissions
UpdateProject will update a project in the database
Update a user's background data in the database
Registers a demo account for use on marmosetdemo.cs.umd.edu
Performs the login steps required for a demo account. Mirrors the normal "PerformLogin" servlet but does not use LDAP
Logs an eclipse launch event to the database
Changes the permissions available (read-only or modify) to a user registered for a particular course.
Updates the post-deadline visibility for a project (i.e. adds/removes the ability of students to see more information about their test cases after the project deadline has passed)
Prints grades for all submissions, for all students
Marks a submission for re-test by the buildServer. Re-tests have a higher priority than new submissions or submissions that are re-testing because of a new test-setup.
Prints the raw xml results with code coverage information in them
Downloads the code coverage results in CSV form
Updates a student or student_registration record
Download code coverage results by package
Queries status information from the various buildServers
View the source using Tarantula-style coverage highlighting
Downloads all submissions for a given project
Prints the results of all submissions after adjusting for background retests that may hav failed. Useful for multi-threaded projects where results are not necessarily consistent.
SubmitProjectViaBlueJ
SubmitProjectViaBlueJSubmitter
Changes the password for a student record. Passwords are used by the GenericStudentPasswordAuthenticationService.
Register a new instructor for this course.
Register a single student for this course.
Creates a .submit file for the given project.
Exports a project into a zipfile that can be read in by another server
Imports a project from a zipfile created by a different server
Upload a new archive of project starter files
Downlaod an archive of project starter files
Process a student survey and put the results into the Database
